title: What happened to the craig and sheila show on direct tv channel 10 at 6 am? It seems that some days it is on and some days it is not.
text:
I
just chatted with Sheila. She said they were doing the radiothon for
the Betty H. Cameron Women's and Children's Hospital for the last
two days. So, other than technical difficulties, they should be back
to normal now.
